text: Ernst Carel Bakker (16 April 1946 in Hellendoorn - 8 February 2014 in Hilversum) was a Dutch politician of Democrats 66 (D66). Bakker was merely active in local politics. He served as a councillor of Amsterdam for several years, and was also an alderman from 1992 to 1998. Afterwards he was mayor of Hilversum from 1998 to 2011. In between he was for a brief period a member of the House of Representatives, from 1981 to 1982. Bakker died at the age of 67 in 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography at Parlement.com Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Democrats 66 politicians Category:Aldermen of the Netherlands Category:Dutch councillors Category:Dutch mayors Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from Overijssel
title: Ernst Bakker
